title: Loop Justification Log Schema
description: Schema for logging justifications made by agents during a loop.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for this log entry.

loop_id.description: The loop ID during which the justification was made.

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent providing the justification.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the justification was logged.

action_decision.description: The action or decision being justified (e.g., Plan Approved, Mutation Risk Score).

justification_text.description: The textual explanation provided by the agent.

confidence_score.description: The agent's confidence in its justification (0.0 to 1.0).

linked_justification_refs.description: List of log_ids from previous justifications that this entry builds upon or relates to.
